medium: Graphite on off-white thin wove paper, mounted down
creditline: Gift of C. O. von Kienbusch, Class of 1906, for the C. O. von Kienbusch Jr. Memorial Collection
inscribed:
Inscribed recto, lower right, in graphite: Modigliani; on back
of former frame, two stamps of Douane Centrale, Paris
(according to catalogue card)
